title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (September 2007)
creator_credit: Terry Melvin, Robyn Colls, Maria McCarthy, Laura Brearley, David Clune, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Life changing events, the experience of Italian immigrants, tributes to loved ones. These four digital stories, created by members of the public and facilitated by ACMI staff, are a biographical record of things closest to the hearts of the participants.
creator_credit_for_label: Terry Melvin, Robyn Colls, Maria McCarthy, Laura Brearley, David Clune, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
